attributes.action: Follow EU ruling to compensate the pension losses occured due to lack of Government Information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So many people lost out when they were encouraged by the Government to take out private pensions only for them to be stolen by executives etc (1990's etc)

The EU ruled that the Government was responsible for encouraging and the lack of security of pensions.

Orignally it was hoped it would be swept under the mat and forgotten about.

Those who thought they were able to retire normally are now forced to work and on lower wages for much longer now.

I am not affected but agree that they should be compensated.

New regulation should be made to prevent any theft occuring in future.
